meanings.definition: Remaining after the departure, removal, or destruction of others.
meanings.sent1: The only cookie left in the jar was chocolate chip.
meanings.sent2: She left her umbrella at the restaurant yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The lonely teddy bear left on the shelf looked sad.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a haunting feeling, as if something important had left.
meanings.sent5: The last puzzle piece left to complete the picture was missing.

meanings.definition: Situated on the side of the body to the west when facing north.
meanings.sent1: The left side of the map showed the location of the treasure.
meanings.sent2: He always wears his watch on his left wrist.
meanings.sent3: The left shoe was missing, so he had to hop around on one foot.
meanings.sent4: The left turn led them to a beautiful garden hidden from view.
meanings.sent5: The left lane on the highway was moving faster than the right lanes.

meanings.definition: The side of a ship that is on the port side when one is facing forward.
meanings.sent1: The captain stood on the left of the ship, gazing out at the horizon.
meanings.sent2: The crew members gathered on the left to watch the dolphins swimming alongside.
meanings.sent3: The left of the ship was where the best sunset views could be enjoyed.
meanings.sent4: The treasure chest was hidden on the left, near the old mast.
meanings.sent5: The left of the ship was painted with colorful stripes for identification.
